stories.title: What Is Life? (Interview with Brian Cox)(YouTube)

stories.text: I check HN daily but I'm also looking for alternative perspective on the Product Owner and Program Manager tracks. Thanks for any suggestions!
stories.title: Ask HN: What are the best Product Owner/PM message boards?

stories.text:
It started innocently. There was (is) a submission from phys.org about birds and windmills which caught my attention. Ironically, it was the odd article which didn't provide links to the actual research or paper it mentioned which caught my eye.

Then in the comments, I saw a strange post from an HN reader which merely pasted an intro paragraph from the phys.org page.

Looking at the submissions from this user, I saw dozens of submissions each day for the last several days. Many had a particular slant related to a particular ongoing war.

Moderator dang is one person. Is there any way we can keep HN from becoming drowned in garbage?
stories.title: Tell HN: HN is not immune to manipulation
